name: Official YouTube Channel
description: tutorials and other helpful videos about Umbraco products.

name: #h5yr
description: High Five, You Rock!

name: 24 Days In Umbraco
description: yearly advent calendar for Umbraco content.

name: Blog Posts
description: blog posts by members of the Umbraco community and Umbraco HQ.

name: Candid Contributions
description: a fortnightly podcast discussing all things Umbraco and open source.

name: Skrift
description: a monthly magazine for sharing knowledge in the Umbraco community.

name: umbraCoffee
description: a weekly YouTube series discussing recent Umbraco news.

name: Unicorner
description: YouTube series from the Chief Unicorn, Niels Hartvig.

name: Official YouTube Channel
description: the Umbraco community YouTube channel.

name: Find and Replace
description: A simple and intuitive package which allows editors to find and replace content.

name: Nexu
description: Keeps tracks of internal links by parsing property data. Will warn editors when something is "in use" when deleting or unpublishing. It's extensible so you can create parsers for your own property or grid editors.

name: Plumber
description: adds a heap of useful bits and pieces to Umbraco, to allow multi-staged workflow approval.

name: Robots.txt editor
description: Edit robots.txt from within the back-office.

name: Translation Manager*
description: lets you handle all of the steps of the translation process from within Umbraco.

name: UI-O-Matic
description: Auto generate an integrated crud UI in Umbraco for a db table based on a petapoco poco.

name: Page Not Found Manager
description: Manage your sites 404 page(s) from Umbraco.

name: Contentment
description: A handy collection of Umbraco components developed for use in your Umbraco projects.

name: Formulate
description: Build website forms (contact forms, newsletter sign ups, surveys, job applications) with no coding.

name: Umbraco Forms*
description: The new Contour, use this to add forms to your site. (Developed by Umbraco HQ)

name: Doc Type Grid Editor
description: Advanced grid editor for Umbraco.

name: Meganav
description: A flexible, draggable link picker for constructing site navigation menus, big or small.

name: OEmbed Picker Property Editor
description: Property editor to allow embedding 3rd party media like Youtube, Vimeo, ... outside of the rich text editor.

name: Personalisation Groups
description: allow personalisation of content to different groups of site visitors

name: Skybrud.ImagePicker
description: a configurable image picker that can be used as either a property editor or grid editor. Each image can be supplemented with a title, description and/or link.

name: Skybrud.LinkPicker
description: a configurable link picker that can be used as either a property editor or grid editor. Supports selecting content, media or specify external URLs.

name: Styled Editors
description: A configural property editor to "replace" the generic textbox & textarea properties. It allows for inline CSS as well as adding classes and having placeholder text.

name: Switcher
description: A simple property editor that works as an alternative to the core true/false datatype.

name: Terratype
description: A fully featured maps data type  supporting multiple map providers (Google Maps, Bing, Leaflet).

name: uEditorNotes
description: Provides a way to display instructional messages for content editors, at the point of content entry.

name: SEO Checker*
description: find common SEO issues in your Umbraco website.

name: CMSImport*
description: import content or members from any datasource into Umbraco.

name: Optimus
description: Bundling and minification of your CSS and Javascript.

name: uSync
description: Syncing tool for reading and writing the database elements to disk.

name: Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects
description: Redirects manager for Umbraco.

name: Our HealthChecks
description: Adds addtional health checks to the back office.

name: Deploy Contrib
description: Offers value-connectors for the most popular Umbraco community packages. To allow Umbraco Cloud deploy to transfer content/property-data to a target environment. (Maintained by Umbraco HQ) Umbraco Cloud only

name: Vendr*
description: eCommerce built on top of Umbraco.

name: uCommerce*
description: .NET eCommerce platform, seamlessly integrates with Umbraco.

name: Articulate
description: Blogging platform.

name: Slimsy
description: Responsive Images using Slimmage for Umbraco.

name: UnVersion
description: Removes previous versions of content.

name: Matryoshka
description: Adding back tabs in Umbraco

name: Skybrud.Umbraco.GridData
description: a package for making the Umbraco grid strongly typed.
